channel.title: Automation on Tomas Balza
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Tomas Balza

item.title: Leveraging Docker and Selenium for Efficient Appointment Checking
item.description: This article explores an automation use-case with Selenium and Docker to periodically access a multi-page js form and check for available appointments.

item.title: Deploy a Hugo Blog on Github Pages using Github Actions
item.description: In this article we will go through the steps of setting up a static website, that will not incur in storage costs or egress fees.
